name: At Long Last
description:
At Long Last is an infiltration One button Game

The goal is to get from a point A to point B, without getting detected by enemies or cameras. 

As this was my first project, the programmation isn't flawless at all, so you'll notice a small delay when pressing the main key to move. I deeply apologize for it it makes the game very furstrating. If you have the courage to continue you get the hang of it, you have my sincere thanks.

Please enjoy the game!
